title: Did Keanu Reeves Say ‘The Road to Heaven Isn’t Through Your Yard’?
subtitle: A viral quotation has been around online for years, but only belatedly was the Hollywood star's name attached to it.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: Keanu Reeves once said or wrote, "I don't care how much you don't like me. The last time I checked, the road to heaven wasn't through your yard."
